title: Organic Lavender Shampoo
description: A soothing and nourishing shampoo infused with organic lavender essential oil. Gently cleanses the hair while promoting relaxation.
instructions: Apply to wet hair, lather, and rinse thoroughly.

title: Sensitive Skin Face Cream
description: A gentle face cream formulated for sensitive skin. Fragrance-free and hypoallergenic.
instructions: Apply a small amount to clean face and neck. Use morning and night.

title: Metal-Free Nail Polish
description: A non-toxic nail polish free from harmful metals like lead and nickel. Available in vibrant shades.
instructions: Apply two coats for best results.
